name: lenscape
description: This is the 'master project' with many child projects. There is no code in this project: it is all managed in child projects

scripts.coverage: yarn coverage:run && yarn laoban coverage-copy && yarn coverage:report
scripts.coveragesh: yarn coverage:run && yarn laoban coverage-copy-sh && yarn coverage:report
scripts.test:allcount: laoban testcount |  grep '^{' | jq -s "{packagesWithTests: length, totalNumTotalTestSuites: map(.numTotalTestSuites) | add, totalNumTotalTests: map(.numTotalTests) | add, totalNumFailedTests: map(.numFailedTests) | add}"

author: phil <phil.rice@validoc.org>
